resources.string: Welcome to worlds most lightest root checker app. This root checker app has no ads and is completely free.To use this app, first press ROOT AND BUSYBOX CHECK VERSION.This button checks if root and busybox are installed.To confirm root access, press CONFIRM ROOT button below.It asks for root access and checks if root is properly installed and verifies that root is not broken.To know your busybox version number, press the BUSYBOX VERSION NUMBER button and you are done.If this application helps you , plz rate it in the play store.
